hero.title: EchoNote
hero.description: Privacy-first local solution for intelligent voice transcription and calendar management that's smart, secure, and efficient.

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: Why Choose EchoNote
features.privacyDescription: All data processed locally, no cloud uploads required, complete privacy protection.
features.localDescription: Powerful local speech recognition and processing capabilities, works without internet connection.
features.smartDescription: Intelligent calendar integration, automatically extracts time and event information from speech.

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.subtitle: Get started with EchoNote in minutes

community.subtitle: Join the EchoNote open source community
